mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (categoryno, categorygrp, categoryname, sortno, visible, rdate) VALUES(CATEGORY_SEQ.nextval, #{categoryGrp}, #{categoryName}, #{sortNo}, #{visible}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT categoryno, categorygrp, categoryname, sortno, visible, rdate FROM category ORDER BY sortno ASC
SELECT categoryno, categorygrp, categoryname, sortno, visible, rdate FROM category WHERE categoryname='--' and visible='Y' ORDER BY sortno ASC
SELECT categoryno, categorygrp, categoryname, sortno, visible, rdate FROM category WHERE categorygrp= #{categoryGrp} and categoryname != '--' and visible='Y' ORDER BY sortno ASC
SELECT categorygrp FROM category WHERE categoryname = '--' ORDER BY sortno ASC

SELECT categoryno, categorygrp, categoryname, sortno, visible, rdate FROM category
WHERE (categoryname != '--') AND ((UPPER(categorygrp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(categoryname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'))
ORDER BY sortno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM category
WHERE (UPPER(categorygrp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(categoryname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY sortno ASC
